metadata.title: CVE-2019-0221 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The SSI printenv command in Apache Tomcat 9.0.0.M1 to 9.0.0.17, 8.5.0 to8.5.39 and 7.0.0 to 7.0.93 echoes user provided data without escaping andis, therefore, vulnerable to XSS. SSI is disabled by default. The printenvcommand is intended for debugging and is unlikely to be present in aproduction website.

criterions.comment: tomcat7 package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
